headline: frost advisory in effect
description:
Frost may damage some crops in frost-prone areas.

Temperatures are expected to drop to near the freezing mark overnight into early Saturday morning.

###

Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to ONstorm@ec.gc.ca or post reports on X using #ONStorm.
instruction: Cover up plants, especially those in frost-prone areas. Take preventative measures to protect frost-sensitive plants and trees.

affected_areas.area_description: Belleville - Quinte West - Eastern Northumberland County
